title: Renfrew: Is there a more legitimate version
content:
Is there a more legitimate version of this font called Renfrew?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907031819im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/renfrew-font_pan_6501.png)

I can only find it on free font sites.

Thank you for your help,

Duncan

 [‹ Toyota "make things better" face...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907031819/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43260 "Go to previous forum topic") ["newFUNKtion" type ID ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907031819/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43257 "Go to next forum topic")
author: duncan

comments.content: The legit version is called Revue, which is currently distributed by ITC. They probably got it along with the other Letraset typefaces in their library. It should be available wherever ITC faces are sold, including [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907031819/http:/www.linotype.com/1404/revue-family.html).

Thank you very much Dan. That is exactly what I wanted to know.

Duncan
